name: Midnight Mysteries 3: Devil on the Mississippi
description: Down by the deep and muddy Mississippi, something’s not right. A ghostly riverboat brings to light a new conspiracy for players to unravel in this all-new Midnight Mystery. Mark Twain’s ghost has come to you seeking help from an evil that has been stalking him in the afterlife.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 7Processor:1.6 GHzMemory:512 MB RAMDirectX®:9.0Hard Drive:442 MB HD space

reviews.review_text: Good point and click hidden object. The Midnight mystery series are on a follow the ghost style plots and this is one of the best in the series.

Playing casually it took me about 5 hours to play. Though a lot of it was spent afk. When I decided to go for all the achievements took me about 2 hours to 100%. There's a in game walk through as well for those who just want this for another quick 100% game. Overall it was just as good as the others. Just another casual hidden object game.
